hint: Apply basic performance techniques: push filters early, convert implicit joins to explicit JOINs, and isolate selective date_dim filtering into a CTE for reuse across all sales channels.
Focus on dimensional pre-filtering by creating CTEs for date_dim and customer with applied filters before joining to fact tables, using explicit joins for better cardinality estimation.
Materialize pre-filtered dimension and fact data into separate CTEs for each sales channel, then perform set operations, aiming to reduce repeated table scans and leverage materialization benefits.
Transform INTERSECT operations to EXISTS semi-joins or window-based deduplication, potentially using a single pass over customer/date dimensions with conditional fact table aggregations.
